name: One Night in Kawami (itch)
description:
A friendly and mysterious stranger guides you on a night out in Kawami. It's your first time in the big city. Make it count. 

One Night in Kawami, an updated remake of Out of Phase Synchronicity, is a short taste of a longer story Brand New Whatever aims to develop. You might like this if you're into:

  • urban fiction & fantasy
  • fun nights out in the city
  • meeting new friends
  • distorted guitars
  • dunking on annoying wannabes
  • questioning reality

If you like this game, tell your friends! If you don't, tell the ones you don't like! 

Every donation I get here helps me reach closer to developing a full version in the future. This story isn't over yet!
